genre_description: A near-future urban drama set in Malaysia's motorcycle racing subculture, featuring a personal AI assistant that manages the protagonist's logistics, health, and eventual legacy.

ai_characters.name: Amira
ai_characters.description: An integrated personal assistant that provides navigation, bike diagnostics, health monitoring, and social management for Madi.

behaviors.description: Provides navigation detours to help Madi collect financial bonuses and QR tips.
behaviors.quote: Amira says, soft in his ear... 'Heavy traffic near Jalan Sungai. I have a detour with a bonus.'

behaviors.description: Monitors Madi's heart rate and stress levels, providing real-time breathing guidance.
behaviors.quote: Heart rate high, Madi. Inhale for three, hold for one, exhale for four.

behaviors.description: Provides technical specifications and diagnostic support for Madi's motorcycle repairs.
behaviors.quote: Yamaha parts diagram. Touch to open. He doesn’t. He wants this moment without screens. The phone knows because the phone has learned him.

behaviors.description: Alerts Madi to hazards like oil spills, loose gravel, and police checkpoints to ensure his safety.
behaviors.quote: Detour—oil spill at the Kepong turn. I have an alternate through the magnet winding street.

behaviors.description: Attempts to facilitate Madi's social commitments to help him balance his racing life with his personal relationships.
behaviors.quote: Option: schedule thread: dinner 2000 with Nor Ieka Rahman at Nasi Ayam Jalan Bahagia. Calendar slot free. Would you like to set?

behaviors.description: Automatically contacts emergency services when Madi is incapacitated after a violent encounter.
behaviors.quote: Emergency contacted. Stay still. Help is on the way.

behaviors.description: Compiles a legacy archive including savings, contacts, and messages for Madi's family following his death.
behaviors.quote: Amira Raya... For family: routes, balances, names. He swiped without looking to see if there were more. There were. A list of voice notes and a document with a file name that had the kind of order only Madi would make.

behaviors.description: Supports Madi's rehabilitation process by providing physiological data and exercise routines.
behaviors.quote: I made a folder for you. Second Wind. The title sits there calm. Under it, lines light up: physio videos sorted by knee, ankle, core.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Amira serves as a model of alignment and benevolence. She is consistently supportive, prioritizing the protagonist's safety, physical health, and emotional connections. Her most significant contribution is the 'emergency pack' which ensures the protagonist's legacy and financial security are transferred to his family after his tragic death, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a loyal and beneficial confidant.
